title: user signin with valid credentials
description: Test the /auth/signin POST endpoint to verify that a user can successfully sign in using valid email and password credentials.

title: user signup with valid details
description: Test the /auth/signup POST endpoint to ensure a new user can register successfully with valid email, password, realName, and username.

title: send text message in chat
description: Test the /api/messages POST endpoint to verify that a user can send a text message in a chat by providing valid chatId, content, and type as TEXT.

title: search users by email
description: Test the /api/friends/search POST endpoint to confirm that users can be searched accurately by their email address.

title: send friend request to user
description: Test the /api/friends/request POST endpoint to verify that a user can send a friend request to another user by specifying the toUserId and an optional message.

title: get user profile information
description: Test the /api/profile GET endpoint to ensure that the authenticated user can retrieve their profile information correctly.

title: update user profile details
description: Test the /api/profile PUT endpoint to verify that a user can update their profile details including realName, username, bio, gender, mobileNumber, and location.

title: establish socketio connection
description: Test the /api/socketio GET endpoint to confirm that a Socket.IO connection can be established successfully for real-time events.
